newsitem.title: USA: Jan. 22 hearing set on U.S. HUD secretary nominee.
newsitem.headline: Jan. 22 hearing set on U.S. HUD secretary nominee.

text.p: The Senate Banking Committee said Tuesday Andrew Cuomo would testify Jan. 22 at a confirmation hearing on his nomination to be secretary of Housing and Urban Development.

Cuomo, 39, was nominated by President Clinton on Dec. 20. He has been an assistant HUD secretary for community planning and development for more than three years. Cuomo is the son of former New York Gov. Mario Cuomo.
Cuomo must be approved by the committee and the full Senate.
